alert.note: Alert for Elko (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 25 at 10:59AM PDT until further notice by NWS Elko
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Nevada... Jarbidge River Below Jarbidge affecting Elko County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. For the Jarbidge River...including Jarbidge...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Jarbidge River Below Jarbidge. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, Minor flooding occurs along the Jarbidge River near Jarbidge. Pine Creek and Bluster campgrounds are flooded. Minor erosion occurs along the primary access road from Idaho to Jarbidge (seasonally, the only access road). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM PDT Thursday the stage was 5.0 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Jarbidge River Jarbidge 5.5 5.0 Wed 11 pm PD MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued tomorrow after 1000 AM PDT.
